main.name: David Ward
main.description: Software engineer with experience in fullstack development and big data
main.bio: I believe technology powers the modern world and that makes contributing to it infinitely exciting. During my freetime you can find me being a foodie around LA with friends or playing with raspberry pi's and microcontrollers in attempts to automate daily chores.
main.contactmessage: Please reach out to me through LinkedIn or email through the form below for the quickest response .

resume.skillmessage: Specalties: Full stack with .NET Framework and Angular and data analysis using Python.

education.description: College taught me how to learn and surrounded me with valuable mentors.

work.title: Student researcher
work.description: Investigated techniques to reduce energy consumption of data centers using simulation software. Created 3D figures for symposium. PI: Dr. Xunfei Jiang.

work.title: Tutor
work.description: Tutored 11 lower division math, chemistry, and computer science courses. Worked with an average of 2-4 students at a time for ~15 hours a week.

work.title: Summer intern
work.description: Used MATLAB to search for hot pixels in a camera designed to highlight tumors for surgeons in real time. Included poster session and symposium presentations with audience of 200+ students.

projects.title: Membrane Protein Domains Motifs Annotations Database
projects.category: My Travel Blog for my post-university travels
projects.description: Fullstack SPA containing novel protein domain data using the .NET entity framework for the backend and Angular for the frontend deployed on Apache server.

projects.title: GPU Enabled "SuperBihelix" Protein Conformational Sampling
projects.description: Created boilerplate code to organize GPCR protein information and enable parallel execution of structural bioinformatics simulation.

projects.title: Wildfire Prediction using ML on raw sattelite data
projects.description: Senior Group Project: Used ML to analyize raw sattelite images to detect patterns related to fire conditions in California

projects.title: Showcase Website for ML Wildfire Prediction
projects.description: Website describing senior project with interactive map of past fires

projects.title: Screeps: Sandbox Programming Game
projects.category: Website I built for a restaurant I like in Thailand
